title: Holeproof Computer Socks [advertisement]
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Advertising

Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Footwear
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Clothing and dress
abstract: Isaac Newton has to rethink his theory of gravity.
description: A commercial for Holeproof 'Computer Socks' set in a patent office, where the inventor's glee at his discovery ('they fall up, not down') causes Isaac Newton to rethink his theory of gravity. Produced by Campaign Palace.
